title: Simulation-Based Problem-Solving Training for Strengthening Scientific Diagnostic Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and organizational management experience as an administrator
context.additional_context: Targets managers requiring scientific problem diagnosis and decision-making within corporations. Practical training is conducted in a digital simulation environment resembling real work situations

learning_goals: Learners can systematically perform diagnostic steps in simulations resembling real scientific problem situations.
Learners complete complex diagnostic tasks with over 80% accuracy by utilizing scaffolding (step-by-step support) provided during the problem-solving process.
Learners can revise diagnostic strategies based on peer feedback and formative assessment after simulation execution.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
